fields.request: Manual QA: Verify net message purge command and retention
fields.request_details: Create a temporary Net Message in the admin (Nodes â†’ Net Messages) and confirm it appears in the changelist. Run `python manage.py purge_net_messages` on the release candidate and refresh the admin to verify all entries are removed. Then create another Net Message and, from the same environment, run `python manage.py shell -c "from datetime import timedelta; from django.utils import timezone; from nodes.models import NetMessage; NetMessage.objects.update(created=timezone.now()-timedelta(hours=25))"` followed by `python manage.py shell -c "from nodes.tasks import purge_stale_net_messages; print(purge_stale_net_messages())"`. Confirm the task reports at least one deletion and the Net Messages list is empty again.
